raw_comment: I notice that the older that people get the less hope they have for the world to be a better place. I wonder what must happen in people's lives that can change their views so drastically as they get older and experience more in the world. This relates to me because I see my own view and the view of those around me changing the older we get and can therefore resonate with people on this chart. A catchy title for this article would be "Is there hope for this world?"
ace_sentences: If a person gets older then the person has less hope that the world will be a better place.
I wonder what must happen in a person's life.
I wonder what can change a person's views drastically.
This change can happen when the person gets older.
This change can happen when the person experiences more in the world.
I see that my view changes when I get older.
I see that the views of people around me change when they get older.
Therefore I can resonate with people on this chart.
The title is: Is there hope for this world?
